text: Di madagoaa di longo ne dau i di King Solomon bolo Joab guu hana gi di Hale Dimaadua, gu i baahi di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha, Solomon gu hagau dana dangada kae hegau gi heeu gi Joab be mee ne lele gi di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha eiaha? Joab ga helekai bolo ia ne hana gi baahi o Dimaadua i dono madagu i Solomon. Gei King Solomon ga hagau Benaiah gi daaligidia Joab gii made.
